website_summaries.verdict: Simple one-click translation in a Bluetooth-enabled compact device. Limited to only six popular languages but is efficient and accurate.
pros: Capable of understanding more than one dialect
Runs on a rechargeable battery that lasts for a full 24 hours of continuous use
Reported ease of use when conversing with another party
Consumers like the size of it, as it fits in a pocket easily
cons: Limited to six languages, which doesn’t include French or Italian
Needs to be connected to WiFi to work

customer_reviews.title: This is really cool
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. Connects to your phone quickly. Handy tool for quick translations!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: VERY SLOW TRANSLATION TIME
customer_reviews.text: After pressing the button and speaking it takes between 30 to 90 seconds for the translation of even just saying, "Hello". Other translators that I have used are instantaneous: You press the button, speak, let off the button and the translation is immediate. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: KNIGHT CRUSADER

customer_reviews.title: Useful and helpful and mostly accurate
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the Translator, I was confused. Only Chinese worked. All of the other languages only showed up on the app but did not "talk." I was really disappointed. I read a few reviews some days later and other had better luck. So I tried again. This time, the languages worked - Chinese, Korean, Spanish, etc. I was impressed with how it worked. The translation is is about as good as Google, which is to say it gets most things but misses a few here and there. The device is small and light and very easy to use. Also, the app is good. I don't know how long the battery lasts but seems good.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gold

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works...
customer_reviews.text: I love how this product does exactly what it says it does. However, it has some limitations. The language switching requires a cellphone with the app nearby for use. Unfortunately you can’t change it on the fly. It also is dependent on your connectivity. Ive had issues when I’m working with someone who did not understand English but the app said their network was down. It’s very tied to the phone and is a hassle if you just want to hand it to someone else to use without you there. When it works it works great, but the few issues i listed above keep me from giving it a perfect score.
customer_reviews.author: Soul

customer_reviews.title: Very Simple To Use
customer_reviews.text: There is only one button on this translator. That one button is all you need. The device can detect what language you are speaking in, and it translates accordingly. (As long as you have the 2 languages set on the app.) The pairing to your phone is also super simple. No need to go into settings, just get the app and press the button. As for sound quality, it spoke well enough for my Spanish-speaking neighbor to fully understand. And I could easily understand him back. Very good little device!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Merrell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I have never been happy with any purchase before. I recently went to mexico for vacation and purchased this device to try it. I have heard a lot about translation devices before from friends and thought of trying it. This device was a lofe saver for me and it enabled me to visit non touristy places because i no longer foreign to any locale. It helped me connect with local people. It is a must buy device for anyone planning to visit a country with different language
customer_reviews.author: Mayank Saklecha

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to use, no accuracy translator
customer_reviews.text: Not a good translator. I think it’s too pricy for the quality. First of all, the translation is not accurate and has language Accents. Seconds, the translations time is too long, it doesn’t respond quick enough. Also, need to be connected to internet, it’s not convenient if I use it to travel aboard. Very hard to use and set up. The reviews and pictures are very misleading. the item is not as good as it describes, I’m requesting for return and refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The first thing you need to do is download update. The bluetooth must be on to pair translator. You must have data on your phone to work, your phone must be connected to translator to work.After the translator is connected to your phone, you do not need your phone out, just needs to be in bluetooth range. Press the button and hold to speak and release and will translate in designated language. There are up to 42 different languages. I tested a couple with pretty fast results.The speaker was loud enough with background sounds to hear it clearly. My only negative is that the phone must be connected to data or wifi for item to work. I recommend product.
customer_reviews.author: ALJ

customer_reviews.title: Great travel companion
customer_reviews.text: I just came back from a 2 week trip from Japan, and having this translator handy really makes a huge difference when traveling abroad. As I don't know any Japanese, having this translator with me really helps when ordering food at a restaurant or asking for directions to anywhere, it looks like the translator is giving accurate translation most of the time as the other person doesn't look puzzled when listening to the translated message. And I feel much more safer when I have to use this when translating the conversation with a local than trying to hand them my phone for the same purpose, as our smartphone is more like a personal item that you should hold onto always.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Sent Back
customer_reviews.text: Even tho it states it works for Android...it did not connect to mine, could not use. Also, upon further reading did not know you have to be able to connect to WIFI. There are places in Mexico (what I bout it for, Spanish) that do not have or carry a WiFi signal. So useless. Sent it back after finding out these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick translation without your phone in your hand!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really neat device, something I wish I'd thought of myself. Leveraging the expansive translation available via web but without having to have your phone out annoying you (and often risking it being stolen!). With a push of a button you can speak into the device to hear a great translation to help in speaking with others, or have a others dialog translated back to you. Having this available in your hand and handling 2-way conversations makes this a really useful device. Highly recommend for foreign travel, if you have a bilingual household, or are trying to pick up a new language.
customer_reviews.author: Nickel

customer_reviews.title: convenient, accurate and smart. Use wifi/data from your phone...
customer_reviews.text: We bought the translator for our parents who does not speak English at all. They can travel with the translator. We have also test it out with our native language, which works great. The translation makes more sense than google translator and other app on my phone. The only thing is not as convenient is that you have to have wifi from your phone and you have to connect the translator with your phone...which mean if you don't have roaming data, the translator won't be working...
customer_reviews.author: sundane

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Words cannot describe how amazing this translator is! I didn’t know what to expect from it but it exceeded even the highest expectations. It translates extremely fast which is important in using a translator in the real world. The app that pairs with the device is quick and efficient. It currently supports English to Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Spanish and Thai (vice versa too) after testing translation from English to Chinese I thought it was very conversational and nature. I would highly recommend getting this! There’s no flaws that I can see right off the bat playing with it the first day!
customer_reviews.author: Steven L.

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work,don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This translator device are so tiny, feel like you can't grab it firmly.Then after open the box ,it took me a while to figure out how to download the apps and connect it with my phone.Pretty frustrated.I tried to let it translate something, but took a while for it to respond.And voice recognition is not good either.What is even worse, we can't use it without wifi connection.It doesn't worth that much ,got to return this.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Fast and accurate  translations.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really neat. I use it to communicate to my cleaning lady. It’s really nice to use when you are out and about. It is highly preferable to use than sticking your phone in someone gave it handing it to them. I think this is a must for travelers. The language selection is ideal for most North America and Asian travel. I would like something for Europe. I hope they plan to add more languages. Note: you do need for you phone with internet for this to work. Some may find this a limiting factor but it is rather essential for updates language expansion.
customer_reviews.author: HubrisHugh

customer_reviews.title: Great Pocket Translator
customer_reviews.text: I downloaded the app from the App Store by using the QSR code provided. It was completely seamless and easy to pair with the device! Love this compact little translator! The packaging was very high end, sleek, and looked like an Apple product. I love how quickly it translates and occasionally the translation is slightly off but that’s to be expected since languages vary conversationally vs direct translations. I think it’s amazing! Great product for an extremely reasonable price! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Pedini

customer_reviews.title: Makes communicating with father in law a breeze
customer_reviews.text: My father-in-law is polish and his English is very broken. And while there have been many times that he and I have problems understanding each other. So, when I saw this and the price, I figured that I couldn’t go wrong. This little device makes it so much easier for me and him to communicate. Also, I work with a couple guys from the Ukraine, and this really has helped me to communicate with them. So much so that they have both ordered one to help themselves out. Awesome gadget if you ever need to communicate with someone that English isn’t their primary language.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Couture

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't do two way translation
customer_reviews.text: This device worked well to translate from English to Spanish for me, but when a Spanish phrase was spoken into it, it consistently repeated it back in Spanish - did not translate to English. Double checked everything in the directions and based on that, I had programmed it correctly. I need translation both ways. I bought this so I could have 2-way translation. Did not work as advertised so I returned it for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fascinating-Works a lot better than I would have ever thought
customer_reviews.text: It is not perfect but it is really really really good. Handles <20 seconds translations very well, highly accurate and quickly. It is not 100% perfect but gets the job done. Was super easy to set up and connect to the smartphone. Honestly I was expecting a lot less and was blown away at the actual working product. Pleasantly surprised. Great value for $100 if you need it for a trip. use it to quickly talk to a cab driver or driver who doesnt speak your language. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: AmnzFan

customer_reviews.title: An insanely amazing gadget!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I am mind blown... This little gadget is so impressive. It took just seconds to download the app, which is very well built and then I was quickly able to connect to the translator via Bluetooth. It’s super slick and light weight. I was able to translate from English, Spanish, and Hindi into multiple different languages instantly and the translation was extremely accurate. This is an incredible product that’s a must have for anybody who travels and interacts with people from other cultures who speak different languages. This thing will go with me everywhere I travel especially internationally from now on, highly recommended!! I also upgraded the firmware which was easy to do, fast and went smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Imran Rahman

customer_reviews.title: A great translator for travelers
customer_reviews.text: This is a great translator for its size . I have used it for a few days with my Mexican friends they tell me the translator works really well and is very accurate. One of my concerns was the small print for instructions. But it was easy to understand. It comes with 6 languages. More languages can be purchased and downloaded in future. This is a great translator for travelers it is small enough to fit in a pocket or purse. I highly recommend this translator for all that travel and don’t know the native languages.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Holley

customer_reviews.title: Fun to Use
customer_reviews.text: I am having fun with this translating from English to Spanish. However, I am still trying to figure it out, as I cannot seem to get it to go from Spanish to English for me. I am sure there is a way to do it, but I just have not figured it out yet. As far as accuracy goes, I’m really not sure how accurate it is, since I don’t know much Spanish. I do plan on trying other languages, and when I become more proficient at using it properly, I will leave a more detailed review.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley McCrory

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Handy Translator
customer_reviews.text: After trying this device for about a week... I can say that for the most part it was really useful compared to using my phone apps for translation. There were instances where the translation was off. I would say about 85% of the time it was accurate. I don’t think you can expect it to be 100% accurate all the time given the vast word, phrase and sentence combinations. With the right expectations, I would definitely recommend using this as it is very portable and easy to use. Build quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: This device is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted to be bi-lingual and this device just about gives you the tools you need in order to be. Im amazed with how well this device works. I use it with some of my Spanish speaking family. I was worried it would have issues picking them up since some of them speak too quickly and this device hasn't missed a beat. The app work great, could have a better name but no complaints with the functionality of it. I would recommend this to any who travels internationally or has issues understanding or communicating with someone who speaks a differently language.,
customer_reviews.author: Jordon M

customer_reviews.title: VERY Easy to Use and Pretty Accurate
customer_reviews.text: I have tested this out with two different languages at this point. Spanish: passed with flying colors. Accurate and recognition of words. French: somewhat accurate and understanding was so-so. In either case, I don't believe it had to do with the speakers of the language. I would however not hesitate to recommend the product. It is super easy to download the app, connect with bluetooth and use. That's all there is to it. Plus, it is very lightweight, slim, and small.
customer_reviews.author: Carie Jones

customer_reviews.title: A really incredible little device
customer_reviews.text: I am truly impressed by this translator. There are way more languages included than it says and it updates all the time. The app is super easy to use and very clean and straightforward. The translation is almost instant and the translations are right on. I tried it with my grandpa who is from Germany and my friend that speaks Spanish. This would be a perfect tool to take with you for traveling to places where you don’t speak the language, that is what I plan on doing with it. The battery life is great and the device is slim and modern looking. I highly recommend this to anyone looking for a language translator
customer_reviews.author: Nate Lors

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Useful for World Travelers
customer_reviews.text: I travel to Europe 4 to 6 times a year, and have often found situations where it's difficult to communicate in English. No problems now! I just got back from a recent trip, and this item was used effectively on multiple occasions. The translations are very good. For fun, I used it one evening with some Dutch friends who were indeed impressed. The translations are accurate. The size of the item is perfect for carrying. So worth the cost! I no longer need to struggle with language tools like Rossetta Stone and Babble before taking my trip. This is all you need!
customer_reviews.author: CoachRHD

customer_reviews.title: A must for travellers
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Product! It translates so many languages in an easy to use way. It is extremely accurate and allows us the ability to communicate with individuals across multiple languages, which proves to be better and more useful than mobile phone applications. The battery life is significant and seems to allow days on end of use without the need to recharge. The streamlined design allows the product to easily slip into any pocket without bulkiness or added weight. Connectivity was seamless over cell networks and WiFi. If you are traveling to a foreign country or work in an environment where language is a barrier this is the product for you. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Braga

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but need to repeat myself
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a good product. Might be my Sconnie accent, but I find that I need to repeat myself or be a bit more clear when I speak. Once I do though, it's on point with the translation. There are plenty of languages to translate to. I don't know how to use the recording feature yet, so I'm not sure of the value there. I'm also suspect of the charging feature. It's a proprietary charger, not a USB. If you lose or break that charger, you're out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Miller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use/Setup
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for an upcoming vacation to help with Spanish and Dutch. Although I haven't used it for that purpose, I have tried it because I know some French and a bit of Spanish. From the conversations I've had, the device is pretty accurate. The speaker is awesome and the way it integrates with the App is pretty remarkable as well. Not sure how long it takes to get to a full charge because it was done overnight. When I woke up, it was fully charged. So far, there hasn't been any issues so I'd recommend it with a two thumbs up rating and well worth the price. Really can't wait to try it on my vacation!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Randall J.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: The translator itself feels nice and has a magnetic type charger which is a nice touch. You have to download the app on your phone and then connect the translator through Bluetooth. After that you use the app to set which languages you are translating to/from and that's pretty much it. Hold the button on the translator and talk into it and release when you are done. Within a couple seconds the translator will speak out the translation. I tried it by translating from Greek to English and the results were pretty understandable. I was impressed and will be giving it to a friend who will be traveling to Thailand in a couple months
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Compact and so easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This little handy device is so easy to use! It’s compact, lightweight and once you download the app on your phone and sync it with the app, it’s ready to use just like that. I had fun trying out different languages but for me, I like to use it for vietnamese translation since my vietnamese is not that great. Definitely recommend for anyone who travels internationally or just for on the go when translation is needed!
customer_reviews.author: Phuong N.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use translator
customer_reviews.text: My first impression with this translator was how sleek and small it was. It wouldn't be a big deal to carry it around on a vacation. You do need to pair it to your phone. I have an iPhone and the pairing process was quick, and the app easy to use. A disclaimer: I don't speak any language other than English, but I can say that the translator did interpret what I was saying fairly quickly. Again, I don't know about the exact accuracy of this device, but it did seem to work really well. It's a great buy if you're planning to use it for tourism.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S. Randall

customer_reviews.title: A little skeptical at first but recommend it
customer_reviews.text: This product is a cellular data-driven device. Effectively, you have a "remote" in your hand so the device live translates what you said into a language that the software supports (only a few languages available so make sure you double-check). Seem to be useful, but you really need to field test the product in a foreign country to test its capability. I toyed with Chinese <-> English and it works well. Will update review as needed.
customer_reviews.author: tttttttttttttttttttttttt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: I was delighted by seeing the design, it is pretty sleek. Set up is super easy, just have to download an app from app store or play store on the phone. Once it is set up (which takes about 2 minutes or less after downloading app), in the app you only need to choose which language you want to translate to which language. That is it. After that just pass on the remote when you speak, hold the button while speaking, release the button, and whatever was spoken would be translated. I am happy with the purchase, and would recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Pankaj Saraswat

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day with my job. It brought me closer to my clients and gave me more confidence that nothing was being misunderstood or taken out of context. It doesn't translate slag well, but it does help that it not only says what is needed to be translated but writes it out so it can be read. The PLUS is that it saves everything that's said until you delete it. This is great to use as reference for later or for note transcripts. The battery life is great and its small enough to fit in your pocket as well. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Abba1700

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Translator
customer_reviews.text: Wow, just wow. I wasn't really sure how good this would be. I test it out with a friend who spoke Japanese. My friend said that whatever I ask the translator it would response in the correct way. It came in a box similar to the iphone or iwatch. Super light and fits easily in my pocket. The design is really nice. The translator is smooth and sleek. I can't wait to use this on my upcoming trips.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied! Cool little device!
customer_reviews.text: Directions are clear and easy to follow. So far so good. I’ve never used a translator before, but I am very satisfied with the product I received. I have only tried it from Spanish to English and vice versa because those are the two languages I know best. English and Spanish translations are accurate. Device is fairly quick when translating. I am very excited to try other languages! The device is a good size to carry in your pocket and take it anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient tool
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this! Just received this. Took a bit to figure out the best way to use it. But, I did it. In the right setting. I can have an actual two way conversation with someone who speaks spanish, russian, chinese. vietnamese, and many more. That is an amazing tool, super convenient !I will bring it with me whenever i travel.It's also great when learning a new language ! It's simple and intuitive, with decent information on word synonyms and stuff. Haven't had any problems so far (about two weeks)
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The phone must be connected with the device through the app on order for it to translate. If you are somewhere without WiFi then you won’t be able to use the translator. Does not connect to all android phones.
customer_reviews.author: Grety

customer_reviews.title: Redundant device?
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, this wasn’t what I thought it would be. You have to connect it to your phone via Bluetooth, in order to access the Internet and do the translation. What is the need for this device then? It’s just an expensive wireless microphone.
customer_reviews.author: DJmichaelmoves

customer_reviews.title: great for spanish learners!!
customer_reviews.text: overall i would say this is a great product!! my boyfriends family speaks primarily spanish and barely any english and it’s vice versa for me so it’s hard to communicate with them, but this is so helpful when i want to talk to them without asking for someone to translate for me. you do need to keep the app running in the background of your phone but the screen doesn’t need to be turned on or anything like that. it’s a cute slick little gadget that works great with very few errors but of course it’s technology and it will make mistakes sometimes :) overall i love it and shipping took about 5-6 days
customer_reviews.author: Bella W

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Language Translator.
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a handheld voice translator before I got this one. The ease of use and the ability to use a lot of different languages is very nice. You could easily carry on a long conversation. If you have a need for a translator this one is an amazing size that fits in your pocket. The app allows you to read what has been said as well as here it back a second time when you push the button again. So if you don't hear all of what was said you can listen to it back and hear it again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!!
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at the accuracy and speed of the interpretation of the spoken language, using normal speech. I work in the medical field and have used it many times with native speakers in several different languages while caring for patients. It is so much less cumbersome than dealing with interpreters, either in person or online. I think this is so much easier, and appears more accurate, than using my phone as a translator.
customer_reviews.author: DRH

customer_reviews.title: Useful Translator
customer_reviews.text: This product is super helpful in translating a number of different languages back and forth. It makes conversation easy between two people who speak different languages. You don't need your phone except to set the language you want to translate, but the written translation in the app is nice in case you miss some of the sentence, or if you were trying to learn. The only complaint I have is that if your accent isn't authentic (say you speak a small amount of conversational Spanish but your accent isn't perfect) then it doesn't always pick up on translation.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Panting

customer_reviews.title: Simple and convenient to use!
customer_reviews.text: All it takes to use is one button! It doesn't get simpler than that! The device itself is very light and also very sleek, which I appreciate a lot. Some translations take a few seconds to process, and may end up oddly worded, which is to be expected with any online translator too, so its workable. Overall, a very convenient product to have when traveling abroad!
customer_reviews.author: chiung hsu

customer_reviews.title: Slick, small, accurate, and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Sleek, portable, and easy to use, this little thing is really impressive. The single negative about it is that it was not clear what the mobile app companion was called... I eventually found it when searching through this page, but there was no mention of its name in the instruction manual for the device. It syncs up immediately and is required to be used alongside the device itself - this is OK, since it's highly customization and easy to use. Recommended, and a GREAT gift for those that use English as a second language (in my case, my in-laws.) Buy Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I’m very impressed with this translator, it works quite seamlessly and interfaces with the smart phone app to translate accurately and quickly! Comes in a small form factor which makes it very portable and great for travelers! Battery also lasts a while so you wont have to be bothered with charging it often, I’ve tested it out with translating Spanish and it was very responsive and efficient at translating what I was saying, definitely recommend especially if you’re traveling abroad and you aren’t fluent in the local language!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tool!!
customer_reviews.text: As a Supervisor in a Chemical plant and have some Vietnamese speaking workers, and this tool has been proven to be very effective, now is they quite don’t understand my instructions, I use the CheetahTALK translator!!! You do have to download the app in order to the translator to work with your phone. Real life used !!! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use! Seems more accurate than Google translate
customer_reviews.text: It is so sleek and small! It is very easy to carry around. It came charged so I could use it right away. I have tried a couple of languages and it was accurate. I like the many language choices. Must have the app open to use it (Bluetooth connection to your phone), but you don’t need your phone in your hand. I do wish the volume were a bit louder and the voice a bit clearer.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Small and compact making easy to take with you. I only used the Spanish translator though there are several other languages. You do have to download and install an app to sync with your phone. It has a rechargeable battery and you can record up to two hours. I would recommend this product. Note: you do need for you phone with internet for this to work.
customer_reviews.author: klampp

customer_reviews.title: Blows my mind!
customer_reviews.text: This translator is amazing. It has plenty of languages to choose from with its two way capabilities! The processing time is also quite fast and very accurate. It would really benefit people who love traveling around the world. I would totally recommend buying this item. I’m looking forward to having better conversations with this awesome tool.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Lam

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm also glad about the device’s voice, loud and clear - it's important for old people. I hope my parents could use it as well when they come and visit me. They don't understand any English. When they go out and have trouble, it's hard for them to find help. With this translator, hopefully it will help them a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Not able to review
customer_reviews.text: I am unable to rate this product. I selected 3 stars because it would not accept my review without it. I purchased this as a gift for a friend of the family. She wanted something more basic that she would not require internet or phone connection. She just wanted something she could speak a Spanish word into and it would say the English word back. She returned it right away. The description sounded good. She wants something simple in a design pre internet, pre smart phone. Lol Don't know if what she wants is available Thank you for asking.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Very Surprised with how well it works
customer_reviews.text: I work with the public and there's a lot of Spanish speaking people in Miami so this thing comes in handy. I am very surprised on how well it works I honestly didn't think it would preform as good as it did. I do wish Haitian was one of the languages on it, because then I would give it 6 stars without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use - great device!
customer_reviews.text: Very intuitive as there is only one button, lol, however I wish they would add something that would turn the device off. I understand that they are still working on developing other languages; I would love one for Tagalog since that's what my mom's side of the family speaks. It's a super lightweight device and would be easy to slip into your pocket and take on trips.
customer_reviews.author: Iona C.

customer_reviews.title: Surprised beyond belief.
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical on how well the product would work. Voice recognition and real time translating are two difficult tasks in their own respects. This product works flawlessly. I am not in the business of stretching The truth. It is very user friendly and the device is sleek yet I feel comfortable leaving it in my back pack or pocket. To anyone on the fence about this product I personally say go for it, you won’t be disappointed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Zane

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy to use translator.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool translating device. It easily paired to my phone after downloading the app and it automatically updated the firmware. I tested it with coworkers who speak Hindi and Russian who said it was pretty accurate and better than some other ones they have used. My kids have even had fun using it.
customer_reviews.author: smiltos

customer_reviews.title: Really Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: It is so simple to use and the design is so sleek! The device is very thin and looks very nice! The app is also really intuitive and has so many languages! I speak 4 languages and tested it out myself, expecting there to be occasional errors, but no! I WAS REALLY IMPRESSED!!! Bravo! The only "downside" is that you need to have internet connection to use (either by cellular connection or wifi), so be aware of that if you take this abroad.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago B. Roldan

customer_reviews.title: Overall Great Translator
customer_reviews.text: I did have a little difficulty getting this translator to connect to my Samsung phone, but once I did it worked great! It gives concise clear translations. If I had an negative, I would say that I wished that it did languages like French. I was surprised that it was not included. I will definitely take this with me when me and my husband plan any vacations away from the US.
customer_reviews.author: mojohns721

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, and I haven't had any issues with it. Setup is very easy- all you have to do is put it near your phone and push the button, and it connects in less than 10 seconds. Then it's very easy to use- just select the language you want translated, push the button, talk, and it translates quickly. It's very accurate- pretty much always gets it exactly correct. Speakers are good- easy to hear, and it's lightweight/ convenient to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Ming Tan

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at how well it worked.
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at how well this worked. The biggest drawback is that you do need your phone with Wi-Fi or cellular out and the app available for the translator to work. I haven’t got to take it on a trip yet but living in south Florida I have had a chance to test it out a few time.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very nice translator to have on hand
customer_reviews.text: I got this translator to help me understand my landscaper better. While I speak some Spanish, I have trouble understanding people speaking Spanish as a primary language because they speak a little too fast for me. This translator has bridged the gap perfectly and I’m very happy with its performance. I have not tried any other languages but I’m sure this is more than capable.
customer_reviews.author: Totroc3

customer_reviews.title: Proper words.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Spanish speaking mother.. its was easy to use.. download the app and connect.. But sometimes it don't translate right.. it would say random things and and loss connections.. note: you must speak proper words or it dont translate.. Explain that to a 55 yr
customer_reviews.author: yessica Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to use. Just press the button and speak the word you want to translate. I extensively tested for Japanese to English and it translate 90% accurate for these languages. Sometime I have to speak twice to get it right translations. Keep word simple. This translator needs internet connection though your cellphone. So make sure you have internet connection while you are in abroad.
customer_reviews.author: Tomomi Sakamoto

customer_reviews.title: Not bad if you know the limitations.
customer_reviews.text: First you need to have internet connection on your phone to use, and if your traveling...thats not always possible. As someone else mentioned, the longer the sentence, the more accurate the translations, short answers and slang are sometimes completely wrong. But in summary it works fairly well, its no universal translater like on star trek, but its a decent step in the right direction.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: So far it works for me
customer_reviews.text: I speak spanish and english so I tried it and it is accurate as far as I can tell. I got it so my daughter and step father can can communicate better cuz she doesnt speak spanish and he speaks mostly spanish. Also helps her with learning. You do have to make sure you pronounce clearly and the fact that you need the phone is kinda annoying but overall great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great translator to talk with family members. I really like the small compact size and so far it has done pretty well. I makes me realize I don’t always speak clearly so at times it doesn’t understand me. When I am clear and enunciate it seems to do a great job. I am looking forward to using it in other settings as I travel to Europe.
customer_reviews.author: scott genovese

customer_reviews.title: Best language translator device on the market
customer_reviews.text: This allows me to communicate with my Chinese friends or would be very useful if I were to go abroad on vacation in any country and speak with the locals. However, at times the translation can be inaccurate can be improved upon. Yet, this is still by far the best translator device available on the market. You can translate your speech in over 42 languages and it translates it immediately. It also seems to have a long battery life as I haven't had to charge it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Tar Mann

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate and useful for translating a conversation.
customer_reviews.text: First, I would like to say this is a very useful gadget when you have different languages residing in the same household, or extended family who's second language is English. The use of the device is simple and easy. I would have given the device a 5 rating, however there are a few small problems that I have encountered since using the device. One, I wish I had a volume control because the speaker is within the device and could not adjust the volume. And last, at times my voice was not recognized or there was a slight delay in the translation. However nothing that would discourage me from suggesting the product to friends and family. Overall good device!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: This product was suprisingly easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This product is much better than google translate or other smart phone applications. The use of the handheld device is very easy and accurate. I was surprised that it would pick up multiple languages without having to switch the settings when conversing from one person to the next. This allows you to speak multiple sentences or conversion back and forth with ease. 5 stars, and I am anxious to use it on my next international vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly perfect
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, when I first purchased this, I thought there was no way this is going to translate several languages, quickly and accurately. But it really does! I only wish there were more languages that I could use at work like Burmese but all in all it's pretty amazing for $99.
customer_reviews.author: Duffey

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I speak some Japanese but am taking a Japanese language class. I was using the translator to help with my homework. It was amazingly accurate! I tried it at a couple local places translating Spanish with similar results. Super easy to install and use (one caveat, I couldn't find the app on Google Play Store so I had to use the RFID from the manual and install with special permissions) but other than that it works like a charm. Cant wait to use it on my next international vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Translation Device
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the usability of this device in all ways. It has excellent volume with a quick response and a very understandable voice. My Hispanic roommate spent a good amount of time using and he said the translations are spot on. I believe this could be very useful when traveling abroad to another place that has an unfamiliar main language. The device itself has a very good feel without feeling cheap or too lightweight. Overall I would recommend this to friends and family and would buy again without any remorse.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Patocka

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Have only used the Spanish to English side, but it does a good job at translation including slang words. Speaker is a little small for noisy situations. I do like the app actually displays the translation if the noise level is too high. A must of all travelers!
customer_reviews.author: M. Hodapp

customer_reviews.title: A travel companion
customer_reviews.text: I find this device very useful during traveling internationally. The aesthetics and form factor of this translator is very appealing and it is very easy to carry in the pocket. I hope to have more language support soon. I would recommend this for people who are traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Jose

customer_reviews.title: Great translator!
customer_reviews.text: This thing saved my life on my recent trip to Europe. I used it quite a bit and it was very helpful. Wasn't super accurate and had issues sometimes recognizing I was speaking but it was certainly better than nothing! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rocket

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is very loud and the sound is very clear. I thank you for the opportunity to use it. It will help me learn the Chinese Skill I have been trying to obtain I don't know how to thank you enough for it. So small, compact and easy to read display.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Chen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Cool little translation device. Super easy to set up and use. My fiance and I will be traveling abroad for our honeymoon at the end of the year so we will be putting this to the real test. Initial impressions with basic translations seems to be pretty accurate. There was a few times where what you said even in English was not heard correctly the first time. Not a huge deal but can get annoying. Other than that it is pretty nice and I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great not to many issues
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a recent trip abroad worked very well in local cafes and when getting taxis. I was thanked by many while using it and they were amazed at what it could do. Some phrases were missing a word or two but not to point where anyone was confused. Battery lasted the whole week. Im sure with updates it will improve.
customer_reviews.author: D. Loftus

customer_reviews.title: I think it's a good product.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know how to use the software at first, so it was quite quiet when translating. You can change that in the software settings, not through your cellphone volume. Also, if you need translation in a noisy environment, I don't believe that there is a translator that will really help. It's not for industry. I have to take my coworkers aside into a quieter area so that we can communicate. Overall, I think it is a good product. The technology might not be far enough along, but when I show it to my coworkers, they are all amazed.
customer_reviews.author: C Fox

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: So far this product is amazing, even though I have only tested a few language,the results are very accurate and easy to understand. I can't wait to fully test it out more with other languages and people. This is one language translator that I would highly recommend. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Bstangs1

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this voice translator. Easy to use right out of the box. The voice recognition is pretty accurate. Just remember to speak slowly. Would like to see more languages available. But for the price, you can’t beat it. Hopefully more languages become available with the updates.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Portable and easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: Great translator to have specially communicating with Hispanic people. Very effective and quite handy to use. I couldn't have been happier. My only negative is the voice sound it could have been improved. Little bit hard to use outdoor. It works perfectly indoor. Highly recommended to solve language barrier.
customer_reviews.author: Trader Maur

customer_reviews.title: Good translations!
customer_reviews.text: We tested ours with a friend who is a native Spanish speaker and she was SO impressed by how good the translation was from English to Spanish. Spanish to English was t as good, but still impressive. It’s kind of a bummer that you can’t add more languages. I wish it included more European languages like French or Italian. It also only works when you can connect your phone to the internet... overall it’s fun. We look forward to trying it out on our next trip.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Impressed by the Accuracy
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the technology and accuracy of this device. I will be using this device when I go out of the country. Also very useful when trying to learn the basics of a new language. Only down fall is that it requires a smart phone to use but it’s 2019 everyone has a smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: Nam Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great device!  Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great device. It's thin/sleek, doesn't take up much space at all. It's easy to setup, fast and an accurate translator. Instant translator. 10x better than Google Translator. Great tool for business or traveling. Highly recommend this device! Great battery life and slim enough to carry in your pocket. Must have device!! 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Gilson

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Easy 2-Way Translator
customer_reviews.text: This translator is AMAZING! We have been testing it out everywhere we can. I have relatives from Italy that are amazed at how well it translates, and we have fun using it at our favorite Thai and Indian restaurants. We are planning a trip to Europe this summer and can't wait to put this to the test!!
customer_reviews.author: S_PAPPAS

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money! Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This device is incredible. I honestly think it's a bit better than google translate in some areas. The response time is very quick and pretty accurate. I also love the fact that you get 30 seconds to talk to the device for it to translate it to the other language. I said a quick little 15-20 second story in english and it translated the whole story accurately in Spanish. I am VERY impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Josue

customer_reviews.title: China's garbage
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this if you trust Chinese products. They say to scan a qr code for the app that supports the product. In fact they say to download the app from the Google play store. Its not even on there. So after scanning the QR code and accessing the app, it says that using this app could basically compromise my phone....im never buying anything that comes from China, nor will I trust their products or apps
customer_reviews.author: Janak Nick Kalsi

customer_reviews.title: Neat little device.
customer_reviews.text: It hooks up to an app that lets you speak into it and responds with the language translation. It’s a neat little device that does what it advertises, and it has been pretty good with picking up my voice. Excited to try it out when traveling abroad next year.
customer_reviews.author: Carolynn Larue Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Cool little device
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to really put it to work when traveling yet, but have been playing around with it and it seems to work really well. I'm excited to really test it out, but so far I'm optimistic!
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve Tried
customer_reviews.text: I think this is one of the best language translating devices I’ve used. It’s small so you can put it in your purse or pocket and have it with you for those needed moments. The app you need to download is easy to understand and use. It keeps a history of all the translations it does as well which can be helpful sometimes. It seems to be very accurate and has quite a few different languages it can translate. If you’re looking for a language translating device, I would recommend checking this one out. It definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gia

customer_reviews.title: A contradiction in terms no don’t like....return
customer_reviews.text: I decided to return it. This translation is useless for me .the translation machine does not work without a connection to the mobile phone. I want to buy one that can translate without call phone or internet.......return
customer_reviews.author: Joe zheng

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for international travelers!
customer_reviews.text: The setup of this was a piece of cake. It is very simple/easy to use. I planned on gifting this to my parents who are going to France in a few months but I kind of want to keep it for myself! This is a piece of mind for international travelers who may be uneasy traveling somewhere where they do not know the language.
customer_reviews.author: katelyn garofalo

customer_reviews.title: A must have for people that travel abroad
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical at first because of the price,it is considerably cheaper than most translators of comparable features. I was mistaken. This translator is amazing. I do not speak 42 languages but the ones I do speak it picked up and translated fluidly. I highly recommend this to anyone who travels abroad or even to make some new friends.
customer_reviews.author: Hillbilly WV

customer_reviews.title: Fast and accurate
customer_reviews.text: This translator has impressed me. I speak Russian and I decided it would be perfect for me to speak to it in Russian and see what it translates. The speed is instant and accuracy of sentences is 99%, but this seems to be a product that is learning and will get smarter through updates.
customer_reviews.author: Eduard Imanov

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this for Spanish so far and it was on point. Charging does take to long and I have not charged it since the first charge. Very light weight and easy to carry in just about anything. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Neesha

customer_reviews.title: it did not work for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: It does translate but it is not accurate or at least Spanish to English, it does not know the words or does not recognize it. For example we tried with all the months in Spanish and it does not translate not even one of them to English, is like the machine does not know those words. You have to be veeeery specific for this to translate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works just as described!
customer_reviews.text: If you are someone who wants a handheld translator this is Definitely a great option. Very ergonomic, speedy, and good accents on the voices, not so robotic. Currently only supports 6 laungauges so make sure the laungauge you are buying this for is supported! The company says more will be supported soon. Photo included is of the backside against a ruler for size comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

product_meta.title: Cheetah CM Smart Instant Language Translator Device (UV Black) Portable Foreign Language Real-Time 2-Way Translations [Support 42 Languages/Voice Operated] Compatible iPhone Android Smartphone
product_meta.description:
Color:UV BlackA Lifetime of New Connections With Just One Press
The CM Translator from Cheetah Talk is the new innovative way to talk, translate, and learn a new language. Supported by Microsoft Cloud computing systems, the translations provided will be accurate, fast, and reliable. Up to 42 languages have been added such as English, Chinese, and Spanish. Connect with more people around the world with the huge variety of languages available. A long-lasting battery will have you talking for up to 2 weeks of use and an engaging 2-way translation offers quick back-and-forth conversations. (In order to successfully use the CM Translator, you need a Wi-Fi connection or cellular data plan. The CheetahTalk App is required and iOS 9.0 or Android 4.4 and above is also a requirement). 

SUPPORTS 42 LANGUAGES: Russian (Russia). French (France). Finnish (Finland). Korean (Korea). Dutch (Netherlands). French (Canada). English (Canada). Czech (Czech Republic). Romanian (Romania). Malay (Malaysia). English (United States). Spanish (Mexico). Norwegian (Norway). Portuguese (Portugal). Japanese (Japan). Swedish (Sweden). Arabic (Saudi Arabia). Slovak (Slovakia). Slovenian (Slovenian). Thai (Thailand). Turkish (Turkey). Spanish (Spain). Catalan (Spain). Greek (Greece). Hungarian (Hungary). Hebrew (Israel). Italian (Italy). Hindi (India). English (India). Indonesian (Indonesia). English (United Kingdom). Vietnamese (Vietnam). Mandarin (Chinese). Cantonese (Chinese). 

MICROSOFT POWERED AI 
World class Microsoft powered AI Translation process offers accurate and instant translations through Cloud systems. 

RELIABLE BATTERY
Highly reliable, superior battery life that lasts up to 180 days of standby time, 2 whole weeks of use, and 24 hrs. straight performance.
feature_bullets: MICROSOFT AI - Powerful and reliable Microsoft based AI Translation Engine provides extremely accurate and instant translations with an innovative and advanced cloud processing system. Talk, translate, learn, and create new friendships.

MULTI-LANGUAGE TRANSLATION - Get the Latest CheetahTalk App and access the most popular languages, i.e English, Spanish, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Thai and more. (Note: CheetahTalk App is required for use. iOS 9.0/Android 5.0 and above is necessary).

SUPERIOR BATTERY - Ultra-long performance and superior battery life. Up to 180 days of standby time and a full 2 weeks of use. Translate, laugh, and learn longer with an all-around greater battery performance.

2-WAY INSTANT TRANSLATION - Enjoy and practice conversations in a different language easily and quickly with instant 2-way translation. Back-and-forth translation allows quicker learning and more entertaining conversations with friends and strangers.
RELIABILITY THAT YOU CAN TRUST – Made by Cheetah Mobile, a public traded leading technology company, the CM translator is a trusted companion in your next adventure.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars672 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
